Author: amberinthewoods
Text: This is Walmart's issue, this isn't a reflection of your size whatsoever. I was in a rush last week and bought two pairs of cheap leggings from there, and just grabbed one pair in one size and the other in the next size up to save time so I didn't have to try them on. Low and behold... the smaller size is roomy, and the larger size is SO tight that the pattern stretches to the point where you can see my tattoos through the material. Their sizing is crazy inconsistent. This is not the first issue of this kind I've had with their clothes. Take a deep breath, homie. You got this.
